items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Stylish and Comfortable Staple
items.body: I was immediately drawn to this cardigan after seeing it on numerous Instagram posts. Upon receiving it, I was pleasantly surprised by its exceptional softness. The intricate details and high-quality construction make it appear much more expensive than its actual price point. One of the standout features of this cardigan is its versatility. It can be dressed up or down, making it suitable for various occasions. Its draped design adds a touch of elegance, while the long length provides ample coverage and warmth. The pockets are a thoughtful addition, allowing you to store your essentials easily. The fabric is also remarkably soft and comfortable against the skin, making it a pleasure to wear. Overall, I highly recommend this MEROKEETY cardigan. It is a stylish, well-made, and flattering piece that has become a staple in my wardrobe. Its exceptional quality and versatility make it a wise investment for any discerning woman. Read more
items.author: Lisa G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a beautiful coat
items.body: I'm so glad I ordered this. It's heavier and nicer than I expected. It's a lovely bone color even though the color description says apricot. I wear a 24w up top and a 26w below. I bought the xx-l with the hope that it would work for me after looking at the measurements chart. This doesn't cover fully for me below and it's definitely a straight up and down cut but it still looks fabulous. It makes me feel very polished. It does take a while to get to the US and at one point the Amazon website showed it was delivered when it was not. I put in for a refund on an undelivered product to Merokeety's customer service page. A very kind customer care person did some digging and located the package's tracking showing that it was still in route despite it showing delivered on Amazon's website. She asked if I could wait for it and I told her I would. It showed up a day later. I have no complaints and the customer service for Merokeety is top notch. Read more
items.author: MeggieLou

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PRISTINE Coatigan!! Shop & Compare
items.body: UPDATE: I loved this coatigan in the pink so I decided to buy other colors. Then I saw a similar product made by Anrabess. So now I’m Comparing Merokeety and Anrabess. The third picture where my midsection is more open is the Anrabess. I bought both in XXL and ivory to comparison shop. The Anrabess was smaller and the color was a “blush” not ivory. Although the Merokeety was more of an Oatmeal than ivory. So neither company does great with muted colors. On the other hand, see picture of the beautiful bright pink Merokeety coatigan. I get compliments all the time. The fibers in the Merokeety feel better to the touch and on the skin compared to Anrabess. I also dont like the side slits on the Merokeety BUT it’s a slightly better quality product than the Anrabess. Overall, you won’t go wrong buying either BUT I’d highly recommend the Merokeety for quality and fit. I now have the pink and oatmeal, which was supposed to be ivory but oh well. ************************************************** I ordered the hot pink. It’s GORGEOUS! It’s flattering. Follow the sizing guide especially if you have broad shoulders and a big chest. The quality is worth more than the money paid. It’s comfortable. Fabric feels soft. It’s a spring/Fall sweater. I will be ordering more colors!! Read more
items.author: Nicholle

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Oversized but cute
items.body: Ordered a medium, could have gone with a small. But keep it because i can wear thicker sweaters and sleeves not too tight. But next time will get a small in a different color for more fit look. Very comfortable Read more
items.author: lanidb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice sweater coat
items.body: A very nice sweater coat for Autumn Read more
items.author: John S. Wallace

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I want all the colors!
items.body: I love this sweater! It’s the perfect mix of comfort and style. You can easily dress it up with slacks or a skirt for work, or throw it on with jeans or leggings for a more casual look. It has a flattering fit and feels soft without being too heavy or bulky. One of the best parts? It washes like a dream. I’ve tossed it in with my regular laundry multiple times, and it comes out looking just as good. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Jackson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for Fall- Mild Winters. Classic look.
items.body: Bought this for an outdoor wedding where the evenings get into the low 50s. It is very warm and can be dressed up or down. I received many compliments and someone even asked if I got from Banana Republic. The material is thick and the pockets are deep. Very comfortable and nice fit. I would buy again! Read more
items.author: "agonzales277"

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars So cute— but do not think it will hold up
items.body: I was so excited to get this sweater jacket I LOVE the color- I LOVE the style- I LOVE the fit —perfect weight for the plane - I purchased a medium- I am 5’4” 140. I saved to take to Canada and the East coast the end of October 2024. I wore it for about 10 hours -5 hours on a plane. I was not in a small coach seat this time so there should not have had much friction — the pictures are of the pilling on my right hip— nothing on the left hip ??!! I am pretty disappointed because this was the first day— I am going to be gone for over a month— so not sure what I can do being away from home. Read more
items.author: DHSTEIN4

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Block Caramel, Khaki, Apricot, Black, Caramel. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
